codelist-item.name: Aid grant excluding debt reorganisation
codelist-item.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which no legal debt is incurred by the recipient.

codelist-item.name: Subsidies to national private investors
codelist-item.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which no legal debt is incurred by the recipient.

codelist-item.name: Interest subsidy grant in AF
codelist-item.category-description: Subsidies to soften the terms of private export credits, or loans or credits by the banking sector.

codelist-item.name: Interest subsidy to national private exporters
codelist-item.category-description: Subsidies to soften the terms of private export credits, or loans or credits by the banking sector.

codelist-item.name: Deposit basis
codelist-item.category-description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally cashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

codelist-item.name: Encashment basis
codelist-item.category-description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally cashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

codelist-item.name: Aid loan excluding debt reorganisation
codelist-item.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

codelist-item.name: Investment-related loan to developing countries
codelist-item.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

codelist-item.name: Loan in a joint venture with the recipient
codelist-item.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

codelist-item.name: Loan to national private investor
codelist-item.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

codelist-item.name: Loan to national private exporter
codelist-item.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

codelist-item.name: Non-banks guaranteed export credits
codelist-item.category-description: Official or private loans which are primarily export-facilitating in purpose. They are usually tied to a specific export from the extending country and not represented by a negotiable instrument.

codelist-item.name: Non-banks non-guaranteed portions of guaranteed export credits
codelist-item.category-description: Official or private loans which are primarily export-facilitating in purpose. They are usually tied to a specific export from the extending country and not represented by a negotiable instrument.

codelist-item.name: Bank export credits
codelist-item.category-description: Official or private loans which are primarily export-facilitating in purpose. They are usually tied to a specific export from the extending country and not represented by a negotiable instrument.

codelist-item.name: Acquisition of equity as part of a joint venture with the recipient
codelist-item.category-description: Investment in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients that is not made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise.

codelist-item.name: Acquisition of equity not part of joint venture in developing countries
codelist-item.category-description: Investment in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients that is not made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise.

codelist-item.name: Other acquisition of equity. Investment in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients that is not made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise.
codelist-item.category-description: Investment in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients that is not made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise.

codelist-item.name: Foreign direct investment
codelist-item.category-description: Investment made by a private entity resident in a reporting country to acquire or add to a lasting interest(1) in an enterprise in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients.

codelist-item.name: Other foreign direct investment, including reinvested earnings
codelist-item.category-description: Investment made by a private entity resident in a reporting country to acquire or add to a lasting interest(1) in an enterprise in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients.

codelist-item.name: Bank bonds
codelist-item.category-description: Acquisition of bonds issued by developing countries.

codelist-item.name: Non-bank bonds
codelist-item.category-description: Acquisition of bonds issued by developing countries.

codelist-item.name: Securities and other instruments issued by multilateral agencies
